casebody.data:
Joe L. BRIDGES, III, Jordan M. Bridges, and Branden J. Herring
v.
BATON ROUGE POLICE DEPARTMENT, City of Baton Rouge; Donlad Dewayne White (in His Official Capacity as Chief of Police of the Baton Rouge Police Department), Kenneth Clark (Individually and in His Official Capacity as an Officer for the Baton Rouge Police Department), Steven Woodring (Individually and in His Official Capacity as an Officer for the Baton Rouge Police Department), Dustin Johnson (Individually and in His Official Capacity as an Officer for the Baton Rouge Police Department), and XYZ Insurance Company NO. 2018-C-0997 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 8, 2018

Denied.
